definitions.definition: buy or obtain (an object or asset) for oneself.
examples: obtain, come by, get, receive, gain, earn, win, come into, be given; Morebuy, purchase, procure, possess oneself of, secure, pick up, adopt; informalget one's hands on, get hold of, land, bag, cop, score "the library's goal is to acquire eight new or upgraded computers in this fiscal year"Morebuy, purchase, procure, possess oneself of, secure, pick up, adopt; get one's hands on, get hold of, land, bag, cop, score the library's goal is to acquire eight new or upgraded computers in this fiscal year

definitions.definition: learn or develop (a skill, habit, or quality).
examples: you must acquire the rudiments of Greek

definitions.definition: achieve (a particular reputation) as a result of one's behavior or activities.
